subproject.description: The overall development objective of the AP Millennium Development Goals Initiative is to provide catalytic support to countries for monitoring, reporting and advocacy/campaign activities. It seeks to develop and strengthen national statistical capacity, as well as provide strategic support for policy research for countries to move forward in their agenda of achieving the MDGs.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: RAS04060 MILLENNIUM DEV GOALS

title: RAS04060 The Millennium Development Goal Initiatives
